data.text: “So wubetumi de darewa atwe ɔdɛnkyɛmmirampɔn
So wubetumi de hama afa ne hwenem,
Ɔbɛkɔ so asrɛ wo sɛ hu no mmɔbɔ ana?
Ɔbɛpene ne wo ayɛ apam
Wubetumi de no ayɛ abɛbɛ te sɛ anomaa
So aguadifo bɛpɛ sɛ wode no bedi nsesagua?
Wubetumi de mpeaw awowɔ ne were mu
Wode wo nsa ka no a,
Ɔkwan biara nni hɔ a wobɛfa so akyere no;
Obiara ntumi nsi ne bo nhwanyan no.
Hena na mede no ka a ɛsɛ sɛ mitua?
“Me werɛ remfi sɛ mɛka nʼakwaa,
Hena na obetumi aworɔw ne ho ahama,
Hena na obetumi abue nʼabogye,
Nʼakyi wɔ bona a ɛsesa so,
sɛnea ɛtetare so fa no nti,
Ɛtoatoa mu denneennen a
Sɛ ɔnwansi a, ɛpepa gya;
Agyatɛn turuw fi nʼanom
Wusiw sen fi ne hwene mu
Ne home ma gyabiriw ano sɔ,
Ne kɔn mu wɔ ahoɔden ankasa;
Ne were a abubu agu so no yɛ peperee;
Ne koko so yɛ den sɛ ɔbotan
Sɛ ɔsɔre a, ahoɔdenfo bɔ huboa;
Afoa wɔ no a, ɛnka no,
Ɔfa dade sɛ wura bi
Agyan mma no nguan;
Kontibaa te sɛ sare wɔ nʼani so;
Abon a ano yɛ nnam tuatua ne yafunu so.
Ɔma bun mu huru sɛ nsu a ɛwɔ ɛsɛn mu
Nea ɔbɛfa no, ɛhɔ nsu no pa yerɛw yerɛw;
Asase so biribiara ne no nsɛ.
Ommu wɔn a wɔyɛ ahantan no mu biara;
